repo_description: GraphQL server implementation in NodeJS, a clone of Hackernews app

schemas.name: schema.graphql
schemas.content:
##
# typeDefs: defines GraphQL Schema, 
# with fields and datatype
# ! make says the field can never be null
##

type Query {
  info: String!
  feed: [Link!]!
  link(id: ID!): Link
}

type Mutation {
  # create new link
  createLink(description: String!, url: String!): Link!
  # update link
  updateLink(id: ID!, description: String, url: String): Link!
  # delete link
  deleteLink(id: ID!): [Link]
}

type Link {
  id: ID!
  description: String!
  url: String!
}
